typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Name as string,
		Skill as string,
		ActionDurationPercentage as string,
		WorkforceFTE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadUpdateActionTasks
ReadUpdateActionTasks select(mapColumn(
		{$id} = Name,
		Skill,
		ActionDurationPercentage,
		WorkforceFTE),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> IdSelection
IdSelection derive({$metadata.$model} = 'dtmi:ActionTask;1',
	{$entityDelete} = 'false') ~> ModelDefinition
ModelDefinition sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['tmp_ActionTasks.v1.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteToTempRepo
